entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 03:49 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
